New Records: Mark Wood took his 50th T20I wicket
Key Match Events: England bowled out Oman for 47 in 13.2 overs
Phil Salt slammed the first two balls for six
Jos Buttler and Jonny Bairstow tore into the Oman attack
England chased down the target in 3.1 overs
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and opted to bowl first
Captain Jos Buttler announced one change to the playing XI, with Reece Topley replacing Chris Jordan
Post-Match Reflections: The win is exactly what England required to turn Group B's NRR equation on its head
For Oman, this fourth defeat in the group was the most disappointing performance of the campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: England now have a superior net run rate to second-placed Scotland in Group B
Adil Rashid proved too good for the Oman tail
